item.title: How to start business analytics with R
item.description: Extend your data analytics skill from Excel to R to make whatever you do much faster!!

item.title: This time I try Rmd File
item.description: library(lubridate) ## ## Attaching package: 'lubridate' ## The following object is masked from 'package:base': ## ## date library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:lubridate': ## ## intersect, setdiff, union ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union After loading the packages, we obtain the dataset from Dastaset library on Ozone.

item.title: Try R markdown in Academic
item.description: We fist load some libraries for handling the data. library(lubridate) ## ## Attaching package: 'lubridate' ## The following object is masked from 'package:base': ## ## date library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:lubridate': ## ## intersect, setdiff, union ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union Let’s work on some Ozone data here.
